Description:
Spacious Townhouse in Central Drysdale
Situated on 364m2 in a manicured garden setting. The biggest one on the block inspection is a necessity to appreciate the interior proportions of this established townhouse in the centre of Drysdale. More like a small house than a unit there are features galore with two spacious bedrooms incorporating floor to ceiling wardrobes. The bathroom has oversized shower, bath and toilet - large enough to accommodate wheelchair access. The open plan living - dining kitchen is light, open and large enough to accommodate any family gathering.
Storage galore in the walk-in pantry, floor to ceiling linen press and laundry cupboards. Extra garage space with remote access and bonus second toilet.
Features split system, ceiling fan, dishwasher, second toilet, 1.5 garage, side access carport, front awning and solar panels. Room for vegies in the back yard and a garden shed to boot !
These properties are sought after and snapped up quickly !
THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO PUBLIC OPEN HOMES SCHEDULED.
Please call the agent to book a private inspection.

Description:
BELLARINE RAIL TRAIL, LAKE LORNE & MUCH MORE
This well presented home on approx 499m2 is situated in a fantastic location in close proximity to the Drysdale Town Centre, shopping hub and schools. Featuring a fantastic open plan kitchen, dining and living area at the rear of the home as well as a second living space/ kids activity room and 4 bedrooms including Master with ensuite and WIR, this home truly embodies a lifestyle which allows plenty of time to enjoy all that the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula has to offer! The home is kept comfortable year round with ducted heating whilst outside enjoys a lovely low maintenance garden, double garage and rear access directly onto the Bellarine Rail Trail! Enjoy walks around Lake Lorne, along the Bellarine Rail trail and much more straight out of your back gate from this sought after location.

Description:
Tranquil Woodville!
Without a moment of doubt this executive residence announces itself as one of the finest in the local property market! Stylish, sophisticated and showcasing an inclusions list of the highest calibre it is a must see for prospective purchasers who demand uncompromising excellence! A fine example of a contemporary open plan design is complemented by highly desirable lifestyle features delivering the ultimate 'sea change' experience!
Beautifully appointed 3 bedroom home; the luxurious master suite is complete with ensuite and walk in robe. A bespoke study design sits seamlessly within the free flowing floor plan
The primary living zone consists of an open plan kitchen/family/dining zone, it is bathed in an abundance of natural light; wonderful use of expansive windows creates a lovely inside/outside connection to the gently cascading landscaped gardens
The kitchen is 'top shelf' in every sense; sleek contemporary straight lines work seamlessly with earthy textures and tones. Expansive dual stone benchtops, custom cabinetry, pendant lighting, stainless steel appliances and one of the cleverest butler's pantry designs you will come across.
This fine residence will excite 'the entertainer' within; a beautifully appointed decked alfresco is complete with Coonara wood heater, custom café blinds and ceiling fan ensuring it provides a wonderful living area for all four seasons
All the modern comforts including gas ducted heating, plantation shutters and ceiling fans.; An impressive inclusions list and key liveability features ensure this home is winning the efficiency stakes (solar panels etc)
A prime land holding of 613m2 (approx) is beautifully landscaped with an emphasis on low maintenance; established fruit trees, raised garden beds, established turf all complement the tranquillity of a truly eye catching pool setting (push button and user friendly).
The A+++ location simply cannot be overstated; positioned right in the heart of a boutique pocket of Drysdale. Surrounded by impressive quality homes and perfectly placed to have all of Drysdales amenities at arms reach (schools, medical services, fully equipped retail sector and a vibrant cafe/restaurant scene. The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; award winning wine labels, beautiful parkland's, excellent boating and fishing prospects and the panoramic views of the bay.
Internal area
162m²

Description:
THIS VILLA GLEAMS, AS NEW, JUST WALK TO TOWN.
Light and bright downsizer, a stylish design with low maintenance and so easy to relax and enjoy your new home. The open plan area includes large living with dining and well equipped kitchen with doors opening to the undercover outdoor patio. Three bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR, the other two have BIR'S, central bathroom, laundry, separate toilet and large utility room for additional storage. Features include central heating, split system, walk in pantry, linen cupboard, quality fittings throughout, dishwasher and more. Spacious double garage with room for workbench and more storage, space for freestanding vehicles outside. A low maintenance garden with water tank and garden shed. A real beauty for the astute buyer, we can even talk quality furniture.

Description:
IMMACULATE HOME WITH LANDSCAPED GARDENS
Perfectly situated in close proximity to shops, schools and amenities is this immaculate home set on a generous 670m2 approx parcel of land which enjoys a flourishing vegetable patch and landscaped gardens that will inspire! Inside features ducted heating, three comfortable bedrooms including Master with ceiling fan, ensuite and WIR, a spacious sunken living room with beautiful bay window and functional kitchen. The dining and second living space enjoy a north facing aspect which allows plenty of light and flows out through sliding glass doors to the rear garden. Secure car accommodation at the end of the extended driveway allows for storage of boats, cars or caravan allowing you to make the most of a seaside Bellarine Peninsula lifestyle with boating, fishing, swimming all a stone's throw away! Call for an inspection today!

Description:
Enticing Opportunity In Central Drysdale!
Situated in the highly sought after Drysdale blue ribbon property precinct, 2/11 Carolanne Drive will not disappoint the astute buyer, downsizing retirees or the savvy investor. With minimal fuss and maximum lifestyle rewards this bright 2 bedroom unit evokes the feel of a blank canvas that is on the brink of greatness. Set back off the street, this comfortably presented home also offers the prospect of a quick and easy cosmetic revival which is sure to reward. The kitchen is the central hub of the home that opens into a spacious lounge/dining area. Additional features of the home are a single car lock up garage and a low maintenance backyard. To further enhance this irresistible opportunity, a short stroll sees you in the heart of Central Drysdale's vibrancy where the cafes, restaurants and shopping options are endless. Award winning wineries and lifestyles pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for are only minutes drive from this fabulous location. Opportunities like this don't come around very often, so please feel free to call me anytime to arrange an inspection at the property.

Description:
PICTURE PERFECT WITH BAY VIEWS!
This brand new luxury home features a stunning design and attention to detail, combined with protected 180 degree picture perfect bay views across Corio Bay and Port Phillip bay with a backdrop of the You Yangs. Upon entering, you will be instantly enveloped in the comforting feeling of home and an overwhelming sense of space with a grand foyer flowing through to a spacious living area leading out to the rear deck & north facing garden. Downstairs also enjoys 3 comfortable bedrooms, generous laundry and beautiful bathroom and walk-in linen storage. The reverse living floorplan has an upstairs with north facing open plan indoor outdoor living space with harmonious and seamless access onto the delightful entertaining deck with breathtaking panoramic views. The entire home is beautifully decorated in soothing neutral tones whilst the stunning designer kitchen features quality fixtures and fittings and a fantastic butlers pantry with an abundance of storage space. Other features of this amazing home include quality flooring and window furnishings, split system, ducted heating and an over sized double garage with rear drive through access. This fabulous home is truly one not to be missed!

Description:
Rare 1 Acre Opportunity in the Heart of Drysdale!
This is your chance to secure your own private oasis, in the heart of it all! Positioned only moments to all major amenities, supermarkets, schools, and public transport on offer, be sure to act quick as this golden opportunity will not last.
The private driveway is lined with established trees and foliage, which leads you to the character filled, ranch style homestead. A full-length verandah is the most perfect place to sit and unwind, while overlooking the expansive and secure front gardens, equipped with your own private pond and offering subtle Bay views. Meticulously maintained and drenched in natural light, the home comprises a fully equipped kitchen with gas cooking, dishwasher and ample storage, while overlooking the meals area and spacious open plan living. A separate formal lounge, 3 bedrooms, the master with en-suite and walk-in-robe, the other 2 hosting built-in-robes, versatile 4th bedroom/study, family bathroom with luxe spa bath, shower and vanity and laundry complete this ideal and cleverly zoned family home.
Access to an expansive undercover entertaining area sits from the main living hub and offers seamless indoor/outdoor entertaining, while enjoying the stunning back garden views. An absolute dream for those with multiple cars, caravans, boats and all toys in between or the quintessential set up for an enviable workshop, the 9m x 9.6m garage, also equipped with its own toilet, will leave a lasting impression! Additional features of the property include; Gas log heater, 2 split systems, monitored security system, multiple water tanks, ceiling fans, café blinds, Crimsafe security doors, additional DLUG with under house storage and sub-division potential (STCA).
Perfectly private and offering the utmost tranquility, this is a once in a lifetime buy, for those who are wanting their own piece of paradise! Blink and you will miss this opportunity - Don't delay!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Unparalleled Design & Master Craftsmanship
The Feel:
A stunning example of modern architecture and true master craftsmanship, this exquisite residence from Riverview Building Solutions is setting the new benchmark for coastal living. Meticulous attention to detail and the highest calibre of fixtures and fittings blend with intelligent design, delivering absolute privacy and a seamless outdoor connection for premier entertaining.
The Facts:
-Architecturally designed and custom built across 4955m2 approx.
-Unparalleled craftsmanship by high-end builder - Riverview Building Solutions
-Contemporary façade blends formed concrete, Silvertop Ash and charcoal cladding
-Striking recycled beams from the Glenmaggie Bridge dating back to the early 1900s
-Sense of light and space with approx. 3m high square set ceilings throughout
-Raked ceilings with glazed divider separating main living and relaxed retreat
-Kitchen featuring 3x NEFF ovens, Highland gas hob, and QASAIR rangehood
-Dual dishwashers and sinks, 2pack custom joinery with BLUM fittings
-Discreet push to open cabinetry in butlers pantry for a wealth of hidden storage
-Expansive north facing entertaining pavilion and lawn space ideal for a pool (STCA)
-North facing bedrooms access private decks and entertaining zone with firepit
-All minor bedrooms are queen sized, all with expansive WIRs
-Palatial master suite with WIR, ensuite with freestanding bath and frameless shower
-Floor to ceiling tiling, underfloor heating and full height storage to all wet areas
-Wormy chestnut hardwood flooring and quality carpets to living and bedrooms
-2-way real wood fireplace, ducted Daikin refrigerated cooling, and heating
-Double glazed windows and doors displaying the best in German technology
-Huge formal lounge at façade, central home office, and further rumpus
-4.2m doors to 18x12m workshop, 75m2 mezzanine storage + 2 rec. rooms
-Oversized DLUG with additional storage room and internal access
-2 circular driveways ideal for trade vehicles, boats, and caravans
-50m2 guest house with luxury bathroom, euro laundry, and outdoor deck
-Full family sized kitchen with Siemens appliances and open living zone
-Lucrative holiday income and separately accessed to the main home
-Central Bellarine location, minutes to surf beaches and quality schools
-Great access to Melbourne via Ferry, or 90mins on the freeway via Geelong
The Owner Loves
"Architecturally designed to maximise light and connect seamlessly with the outdoors, the central living zones are perfect for those who love to entertain. We pride ourselves on providing world-class fixtures and fittings, and we think buyers looking for a quality home on the coast will be impressed."

In the Hub of the commercial area, RESIDENCE PLUS COMMERCIAL BUILDING.
Live as well as work next door or rent out, this 2053m2 property has enormous potential for investors, future developers, or owner occupiers. Currently used as a very successful gym and fitness centre, it has multiple exercise areas, ample visitor parking, and its own 4 bedroom residence. DRYSDALE is moving and commercial space is hard to get. Do not rent anymore buy your own.

Description:
You'll Want it All
Located centrally to Drysdale, build in 2007 and on a 982 M2 allotment is this awesome family home, comprising high ceilings, a formal entrance, off which runs a study to the left and formal lounge to the right. A huge open plan Kitchen/Family/Meals, with spotted gum timber floors, stainless steel appliances and a walk in Butlers Pantry to beat all others.
A separate rumpus room has double doors to the double remote garage, which makes moving in and out as easy as. There are 4 Bedrooms with walk in robes, loads of storage and a second garage/workshop off the laundry. Out side offers loads of benefits too. Some of which are a great outdoor living area with built in wood/pizza oven, plenty of grassed areas and additional off street parking behind gates.
Seeing is believing, so come see for yourself.

Description:
UNITS WALKING DISTANCE TO AMENITIES IN DEMAND
This just listed two bedroom unit is a short walk to the township of Drysdale. Rarely do units come on the market so close to town.
Freshly painted in neutral tones, good functional layout. Everything in easy reach in the kitchen. Neat undercover area at the rear of the unit to sit and read the paper and listen to the birds. Electric heating for the cooler months and a split system to keep you cool in summer. Single garage with remote plus a visitor parking spot. Built with maintenance free cladding and protected by a veranda allows you more time to enjoy the property. There are only three units on the site.
Why Drysdale? Itâs a historic town that lacks nothing that you require for a quiet life. Everything is close and handy including public transport, medical centres, shopping complexes etc. Will suit downsizer or investor.
Come along to an open for inspection or book a private viewing. You wonât be disappointed.

Description:
FAMILY HOME in CENTRAL DRYSDALE 1160m2
This established home in the heart of Drysdale will provide the enjoyment of spacious gardens on a large block whilst having the future potential to subdivide STCA. An abundance of yard space for the young, growing family or the avid retiree gardener. Beautiful mature trees shade the gardens. Situated around the corner from the Drysdale Primary School and 5 minutes walk to the local shopping centre. All services at your finger tips !
The home is of solid construction comprising 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and 2 living zones. Looking for a home for extended family to have their own bed-sitter ? Then look no further.
Modern stone bench tops, neutral floor coverings and quality window furnishings have been added.
Generous bedrooms with ample robe space, gas space heating and split system are all features of the home.
The outdoor spa is serviced and ready for the warmer weather to come.
Parking options galore with a single over-sized single garage, double carport and room to build a workshop or shedding at the rear. Properties of this size are rare close to all amenities. Call the agent to inspect now !

Description:
RURAL RETREAT FIT FOR A FAMILY
Escape the city hustle and bustle at your own Bellarine rural retreat, complete with an orchard, elevator, games room with billiard table, sauna and spa.
The 1908sqm property is ready-made for a family seeking a tree-change lifestyle.
Along with loads of room for kids to run free, theres a creek at the bottom of the block with a walking track and a 15m x 6m garage, plus outdoor parking area, to house any number of boys toys, such as cars, motorbikes, boats and a caravan.
One the main level, the double-storey house has space to spread out, with four bedrooms, master ensuite and central bathroom, huge kitchen, dining and living zone, plus formal lounge.
The kitchen, with large butlers pantry and quality appliances, is at the centre of the action, overlooking the family living area with a welcoming open fire.
Take the custom-built elevator or stairs down to a getaway area featuring the pool room, bar, undercover spa and sauna, family laundry and a double garage.
When the great outdoors beckons, step from the top level onto a massive undercover wrap-around deck, fitted with electric shutters, fans and gas heaters to suit any weather.
As a bonus, a barbecue on the deck (connected to the household gas) forms part of the property sale, along with the pool table.
Further afield is a man cave to die for fitted with roller doors, workshop and storage area, toilet and wood heater.
The orchard is a fruit lovers delight, boasting produce including avocadoes, plums, apricots, nectarines, apples, cherries, lemons, pecans, macadamias and mulberries.
Other highlights include split-system heating and cooling, walk-in and built-in robes, ducted vacuuming, double-glazed windows at the front of the house, rainwater tanks, 12 x Solar Panels and a chicken run.
The property is close to sport at Drysdale Reserve, picturesque McLeods Waterholes Reserve, central shopping, well-regarded schools, including St Ignatius College, Christian College and Bellarine Secondary College, popular wineries, golf courses and beaches.

Description:
RAIL TRAIL POSITION ON APP. 703 SQM. FABULOUS HOME !
A great location in the middle of Drysdale and designed for privacy and loads of living, even work from home. The Drysdale village, schools, Lake Lorne and all amenities within easy walking distance. Immediately appealing with a wide entrance through to the open plan living with an excellent kitchen, dining and lounge area which opens to the outside undercover entertaining area. Three queen sized bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite, other two have BIR'S. The fourth room can be a bedroom or a flexible space for required use, currently another lounge room. Central bathroom, separate powder room and laundry. Upstairs is a large living area for theatre, games and loads of options, another toilet here for convenience. Features include gas log fire, split system, pantry, bamboo flooring, quality fittings and furnishings throughout, lots of storage and so much more to impress. The pool area is just perfect and can be viewed from the outdoor area, relax and enjoy. Big freestanding garage as well with access to back area. This generous home is one of the best and will impress!

Description:
Stylish New Single Level Townhouse
Overlooking a park and situated on the corner of a quiet street in Drysdale is a brand, spanking new single-level townhouse. Showcasing contemporary flair and charcoal tones throughout, there is a slick feel to this property.
At the front of the residence is the bright and open living and dining hub that flows out to a courtyard. The kitchen boasts stone bench tops, island breakfast bar, Smeg appliances, textured white subway splashback and ample cabinetry.
Along the hallway there is access to a double lock-up garage and generous linen press. Up two steps to a carpeted slumber zone consisting of three queen size bedrooms, two with built-in robes and master with a walk-in and en suite.
The hotel-style bathroom pulses sophistication with a soaker tub, vanity, speckled concrete tiles and shower. Extra touches include a full laundry, separate toilet, water tank servicing toilets, double glazed windows, block-out blinds and refrigerated cooling and heating.
With this kind of location the lucky owners will be walking to the shops, cafes, heart of town and schools. A perfect downsizer, first-home purchase or addition to a property portfolio. Call Richard for an inspection today!
- Brand new stylish and light townhouse in Drysdale
- Three queen size bedrooms, master with an en suite and WIR
- Low maintenance residence close to shops, schools and cafes

Description:
The Ultimate Family Retreat
Located on a quiet street in a friendly neighbourhood, this spacious family home is situated on 800sqm allotment (approx.). Including a warm and inviting ambience, it has been designed for comfort and practicality, offering the ideal base for peaceful family living.
A stunning combination of period features, soothing interior tones and generous room dimensions. This functionable floor plan comprises 4 generous size bedrooms all with robes, master with a walk-in robe and ensuite. boasts two living spaces (one with a charming fireplace), and an additional room which can be converted into either a study, theatre room or a 5th Bedroom. This family home is perfectly positioned for an abundance of natural light with north-facing open plan living, meals & kitchen, effortless connection to the outdoors is achieved with sliding doors to the extended covered alfresco area for year-round entertaining.
Other features include, smeg 900mm freestanding oven & gas cooktop, an island benchtop plus a generously proportioned walk-in pantry combined European laundry, wide garage with internal access and single drive through, ducted heating, split system, high ceilings, floating timber floors, plush carpets, remote controlled DLUG, charming fireplace and plantation shutters in master along with established and low maintenance gardens.
Within close proximity to Drysdale Shopping Centre and cafes, this is a rare opportunity to enjoy the Drysdale lifestyle you so richly deserve.

Description:
Move In And Enjoy!
The Feel:
Set in a great position near schools & shops, this as new home boasts dual living areas, open plan design & 4 bedrooms. The kitchen incorporates a generous island bench, stainless steel appliances & a walk-in pantry, overlooking the meals area which leads to a covered alfresco area. The master bedroom has a large WIR & en suite, & a central bathroom services the other 3 bedrooms. Ducted heating, DLUG & double gates to the rear for caravan or boat storage make this a must-inspect.
The Facts:
-Well-presented brick veneer 4-bedroom family home
-First impressions of neat well-kept garden & covered portico entrance
-Open plan layout with lovely treed outlook from kitchen, living and meals area
-Sliding doors to north-facing covered outdoor living area, large lawn & boundary plantings
-Carpeted 2nd living area offers relaxed lounge or versatile games room/rumpus
-Light, bright spaces, with tiled entry, hall & main living + carpet to all bedrooms
-Quality s/s appliances; 900mm electric oven, 5 burner gas cooktop, dishwasher + walk-in pantry
-South-facing Master with double door entry, en suite & roomy walk-in robe
-3 more well-appointed bedrooms with BIRs to accommodate a growing family
-Main family bathroom with bath & shower, Tastic heater, plus separate toilet
-Ducted heating throughout
-Fantastic location close to all facilities & within the ever-popular school precinct
-RC DLUG w/ TV point & rear door access
-Double gates provide practical OSP in the backyard for cars, boat or a caravan
The Owner Loves.
We love the privacy of our sunny backyard, and its a great neighbourhood with easy access to schools, reserves, shops & beaches.
